title: 查找二维数组的目标值
body_html:
var findNumberIn2DArray = function(matrix, target) {
    if (matrix == null || matrix.length == 0) {
        return false
    }
    let row = 0
    let column = matrix[0].length - 1
    while (row < matrix.length && column >= 0) {
        if (matrix[row][column] == target) {
            return true
        } else if (matrix[row][column] > target) {
            column--
        } else {
            row++
        }
    }
    return false
};
